title: Anthropologie Nov. 2013 catalog - Big serif, thick/thin, big swashes
author: Sam Lowry

comments.content:
Don't think it's a font, rather a custom lettering, a reinterpretation of "Didot".  
Out-of-the-box: [Aquus](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417143217/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/phospho/aquus), [Vironica](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417143217/http:/ontwerp.tv/Neo2-2011) (by Ontwerp, used to be freely available with [Neo2 Magazine](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417143217/http:/www.neo2.es/blog/category/typography))  
To be tweaked: [Didot HTF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417143217/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/didot/overview) (best Didot on the market with highly contrasted styles), [Narziss HJT](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417143217/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hubertjocham/narziss) Drops (to get some ball terminals)
